description: If a defending unit is <hyperlink>Obscured</hyperlink> or in a <hyperlink>Mist</hyperlink> cloud at the end of its turn, it gains a random <hyperlink>Negative Status Effect</hyperlink>.
name: Altered Guile

description: At the end of its turn, if this unit is <hyperlink>Obscured</hyperlink> or in a <hyperlink>Mist</hyperlink> cloud, it gains a random <hyperlink>Negative Status Effect</hyperlink>.

Every 2<turn></turn>, all non-<hyperlink>Floating movement</hyperlink> and non-<hyperlink>Flying movement</hyperlink> attacking units suffer 20 <damagePhysical></damagePhysical> <hyperlink>Physical Damage</hyperlink>.
name: Arcanium Tremors

description: When a defending unit dies, all adjacent hostile units suffer 15 <damageSpirit></damageSpirit> <hyperlink>Spirit Damage</hyperlink> and have 90% base chance of suffering <hyperlink>Condemned</hyperlink>.
name: Archon Martyrdom

description: Every 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, all <hyperlink>Positive Status Effect</hyperlink> are dispelled from all units. For each status effect dispelled, the unit gains <hyperlink>Sundered resistance</hyperlink>.
name: Disruption Pulse

description:
All enemy units suffer Wet until the end of battle.

In addition, after 5 Turn, all enemy units that are Wet suffer 20 Lightning Damage and have a 60%% chance of suffering Stunned.
name: Autumn Storm

description: All attacking units become <hyperlink>Blinded</hyperlink> but gain <hyperlink>Immumeseduced</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Avert your Eyes!

description: At the start of battle, all attacking units become <hyperlink>Berserk</hyperlink> for 1 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Berserk Attackers

description: At the start of battle, all defending units suffer <hyperlink>Berserk</hyperlink> for 1 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Berserk Defenders

description: All attacking units have <hyperlink>Bolstered defense</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Defensive Attackers

description: All defending units have <hyperlink>Bolstered defense</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Defensive Defenders

description: All attacking units have <hyperlink>Bolstered resistance</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Resistant Attackers

description: All defending units have <hyperlink>Bolstered resistance</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Resistant Defenders

description: Whenever an attacking unit starts their turn in a <hyperlink>Flora Obstacle</hyperlink>, they gain <hyperlink>Fortune</hyperlink>, <hyperlink>Strengthened</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Regeneration</hyperlink>.
name: Boon of Nature

description: At the start of battle, all attacking units suffer <GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.BURNING></GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.BURNING> for 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Burning

description: All attacking units suffer <hyperlink>Condemned</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Confessed and Condemned

description: Every 2 <turn></turn>, a marker is placed. Then, after 1 <turn></turn> burning debris will crash down, and units within 1 <range></range> of the marker will suffer 10 <damagephysical></damagephysical> and 10 <damagefire></damagefire>. The target hexes will gain <hyperlink>On Fire</hyperlink>.
name: Crashing Rubble

description: When this expires, burning debris will crash down, and units within <range></range> <range></range> will suffer <damagephysical></damagephysical> <damagephysical></damagephysical> and <damagefire></damagefire> <damagefire></damagefire>. The target hexes will gain <hyperlink>On Fire</hyperlink>.

At the start of battle, a unit is secretly chosen to be the target of the curse. This target will become <hyperlink>Stunned</hyperlink> in 2 <turn></turn> if it is still alive, and a new target will then be chosen.
name: Gorgon's Curse

description: When this expires, the unit will become <hyperlink>Stunned</hyperlink>.

At the start of battle, a unit is secretly chosen to be the target of the curse. This target will become Stunned in 2 if it is still alive, and a new target will then be chosen.

You can see who the target of the curse is.
name: Gorgon's Visible Curse

description: Attacking units suffer  <damagephysical></damagephysical> at the start of combat.
name: Damaged Attackers

description: Defending units suffer  <damagephysical></damagephysical> at the start of combat.
name: Damaged Defenders

description: In 5 <turn></turn>, a <hyperlink>Balor</hyperlink> will be summoned on the defender's side.
name: Demonic Summoning

description: All defending units have been turned into Dire Penguins.
name: Dire Penguin Menace

description: All attacking units have -10 <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>Morale</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Discouraged Attackers

description: All defending units have -10 <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>Morale</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Discouraged Defenders

description: Summon winds to disperse 50% of the mist clouds.
name: Disperse Mist

description: Every 2 <turn></turn>, all units are teleported by 2 hexes.
name: Displaced Reality

description:
When a Red Dragon has Draconic rage, all attacking units have a 90% chance to suffer Burning every turn.

When a Blue Dragon has Draconic rage, all attacking units have a 60% chance to get Frozen every turn.
name: Draconic Catalyst

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Unit sustains <ELECRIFIED_DAMAGE_OVER_TIME>ATTACK>Shock></ELECRIFIED_DAMAGE_OVER_TIME>ATTACK>Shock> <damageLightning></damageLightning> <hyperlink>Lightning Damage</hyperlink> each <turn></turn>.</bullet><bullet>Stacks up to 5 times.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Electrified

description: All attacking units have +10 <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>Morale</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Encouraged Attackers

description: All defending units have +10 <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>Morale</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Encouraged Defenders

description: The area is filled with heaps of worthless, fake coins which [abilityred]slow down[/abilityred] units and are potentially dangerous when taking <damageshock></damageshock> Shock damage.
name: Endless Treasure

description:
Undead Servants fight to protect the Undead Queen!

All defending units resurrect 1 Turn after being killed for the first time.

Destroying the defending Hero instantly kills all enemies.
name: Undead Servants

description: The Hero leading this army is the Expedition Leader. If the Expedition Leader flees or dies but the battle is won, the remaining forces will revive the Expedition Leader after battle.
name: Expedition Leader

description: Several areas and flammable obstacles are <hyperlink>On Fire</hyperlink>.
name: Rampant Fire

description: Until the end of battle, all attacking units are immune to suffering <hyperlink>Burning</hyperlink>
name: Immunity to Burning Attackers

description: Base <hyperlink>Physical Ranged</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Magic</hyperlink> attacks of all defending units gain +<FOCUSED_GAZE_RANGE_BOOST>ADD>MaxRange></FOCUSED_GAZE_RANGE_BOOST>ADD>MaxRange> <hyperlink><range></range>Range</hyperlink>.
name: Focused Gaze

description: Every 3 <turn></turn>, all attacking units suffer 10 and have 30% chance of suffering <hyperlink>Frozen</hyperlink>. If it fails, the units suffers <hyperlink>Slowing</hyperlink> instead.
name: Freezing Winds

description: After a Lightning from the Lightning Storm strikes, all defending units are dealt 5 <damageFrost></damageFrost> <hyperlink>Frost Damage</hyperlink>.
name: Frigid Winds

description: All defending units have the <hyperlink>Violent gorging</hyperlink> ability.
name: Gorging Predators

description: Defending Units have <hyperlink>Hastened</hyperlink>, <hyperlink>Swift</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Slippery</hyperlink> until the end of combat.
name: Unnatural Speed

description: At the start of battle, all attacking units have <hyperlink>Hastened</hyperlink> for 3 <turn></turn>.
name: Hastened Attackers

description: At the start of battle, all defending units have <hyperlink>Hastened</hyperlink> for 3 <turn></turn>.
name: Hastened Defenders

description: At the start of a turn, for the next 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink> a random attacking unit takes 24 <damageLightning></damageLightning> <hyperlink>Lightning Damage</hyperlink>, but also becomes <hyperlink>Hastened</hyperlink> for 1 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Hastening Storm

description:
Several hidden traps are scattered on the map! If a unit moves over them, it will be inflicted with Bleeding for 3 Turn and reveal the trap!

Does not affect Floating movement, Flying movement, or Ethereal units.
name: Hidden Traps

description: All attacking units are <hyperlink>Immumeseduced</hyperlink> until the end of battle!

The defending Horned God is leeching power from the surrounding nature. Each <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, all <hyperlink>Flora Obstacle</hyperlink> obstacles within a 2-hex range are consumed, healing the Horned God +10 <hp></hp> and granting 1 <hyperlink>Strengthened</hyperlink> for 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Nature Leeching

description: Until the end of combat, the defending units gain additional lightning resistance.
name: Advanced Lightning Resistance

description: At the start of a turn, for the next 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink> a random attacking unit takes 24 <damageLightning></damageLightning> <hyperlink>Lightning Damage</hyperlink>.
name: Lightning Storm

description: Several corpses are strewn over the map. They might be useful for necromancy...
name: Littered with Corpses

description: Every 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, one of the attacker's units becomes permanently <hyperlink>Mind controlled</hyperlink>.
name: Dark Whispers

description: Attacker units that are <hyperlink>Faithful</hyperlink> gain <hyperlink>Control Loss Immunity</hyperlink>.
name: Faithful Loyalty

description: After the first 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, force one of the defending units to become <hyperlink>Mind controlled</hyperlink> and fight for you.
name: Cut Strings

description: Attacker units that become <hyperlink>Mind controlled</hyperlink> are <hyperlink>Stunned</hyperlink> for 1 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Control Wards

description: At the start of combat, the second strongest unit in the defending army becomes <hyperlink>Stunned</hyperlink> for 6 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>
name: Break Control

description: A wave of 2 additional defending units will spawn in 2 <turn></turn>!
name: Spawn First Wave

description: All attacking units have <GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.MIRROR_VEIL_DAMAGE_REFLECTION></GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.MIRROR_VEIL_DAMAGE_REFLECTION>
name: Mirror Veil Attackers

description: All defending units have <GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.MIRROR_VEIL_DAMAGE_REFLECTION></GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.MIRROR_VEIL_DAMAGE_REFLECTION>
name: Mirror Veil Defenders

description: <hyperlink>Obscuring</hyperlink> Mist covers the battlefield, giving all units standing in the mist +5 <resistance></resistance> <hyperlink>Resistance</hyperlink>, but attacking units also gain <hyperlink>Distracted</hyperlink>.
name: Misty Magic

description: <hyperlink>Obscuring</hyperlink> Mist covers the battlefield for 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, giving your units standing in the mist +1 <resistance></resistance> <hyperlink>Resistance</hyperlink> and enemy units become <hyperlink>Distracted</hyperlink>.
Every 2 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, all defending units gain <hyperlink>Rallying</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Fortune</hyperlink>.
name: Oh So Lucky

description: The defending <hyperlink>Lost wizard unit</hyperlink> hungers for forbidden knowledge and ancient spells. Every time a Spell is cast, it gains 3 random <hyperlink>Positive Status Effect</hyperlink>.
name: Omni Attunement

description: Cool moisture is passing through the opened vents! Standing on vents will make units <hyperlink>Wet</hyperlink> and can dispel <hyperlink>Burning</hyperlink>.
name: Cooling Vents

description: The Karagh gains the ability to consume the piles of bones scattered around the map. Consuming a pile gives the Karagh a stack of <hyperlink>Combatproperty devoured power</hyperlink>.
name: Gluttonous Power

description: Consume food to gain 1 stack of <hyperlink>Combatproperty devoured power</hyperlink>.
name: Devour Food

description: All defending units suffer <hyperlink>Condemned</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Condemned Defenders

description: <bulletlist><bullet>Max <hyperlink><hp></hp></hyperlink> raised by 25.</bullet><bullet>Gains 1 stack of <hyperlink>Strengthened</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Devoured Power

description: At the start of battle, all attacking units have <hyperlink>Hastened</hyperlink>.
name: Hastened Attackers

description: The Karagh cannot use its <hyperlink>Terrifying gorging</hyperlink> ability.
name: Unappetizing

description: Poison the Karaghs' food, making the Karagh gain 1 stack of <hyperlink>Poisoned</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Diseased</hyperlink> whenever eating a crate of food.
name: Poisoned Food

description: For the first 2 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, the Lightning Storm will only target the defending units.
name: Storm Manipulation

description:
This tree has been affected by a plague and is secreting poison!
All Flora obstacles are poisonous.Every 3 Turn, all attacking units have a 90% base chance of suffering Poisoned for 3 Turn.
name: Poisoned Tree

description: Until the end of combat, all support abilities from attacking units will dispel <hyperlink>Poisoned</hyperlink> on the target(s).
name: Poison Antidotes

description: All defending Golems gain <hyperlink>Fiery rebirth</hyperlink>.
name: Fiery Reconstruction

description: All attacking Tier 1 - Tier 3 units gain <hyperlink>Fiery rebirth</hyperlink>.
name: Lesser Rebirth

description: All attacking units start combat with +4 <defensefire></defensefire> <hyperlink>Fire Resistance</hyperlink>.
name: Advanced Fire Resistance

description: Every 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, a Golem on the defending side becomes <hyperlink>Gilded</hyperlink>.
name: Gilded Construct

description: All defending Golems gain <hyperlink>Fiery rebirth</hyperlink>, but the <hyperlink>Fiery rebirth</hyperlink> deals no <damageFire></damageFire> <hyperlink>Fire Damage</hyperlink>.
name: Cooled Reconstruction

description: All attacking units gain extra <hyperlink>Hs defense defense</hyperlink> against <GLOBAL.RetaliationConcept.Name></GLOBAL.RetaliationConcept.Name>.
name: Retrain Troops

description: Continuous rain makes all units <hyperlink>Wet</hyperlink>.
name: Rainfall

description: This location has been razed or raided. Many obstacles are damaged, destroyed, or on fire.
name: Razed

description:
Several traps have been revealed on the map! If a unit moves over them, it will be inflicted with Bleeding for 3 Turn and reveal the trap!

Does not affect Floating movement, Flying movement, or Ethereal units.
name: Revealed Traps

description: The attacker has seized control of the ritual! In 5 <turn></turn>, a <hyperlink>Balor</hyperlink> with <hyperlink>Berserk</hyperlink> will join the attacker until the end of battle.
Each 2 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, one of the attacking units has a 90% base chance of suffering <hyperlink>Distracted</hyperlink> until the end of combat.
name: Distracting Whispers

description: The duelist takes reduced damage from all units, except from the stack leader of the opposing army.
name: Duelist's Protection

description: The attacking armies <hyperlink>Expeditionleader</hyperlink> <hyperlink>Taunt</hyperlink> the Silver Knight until the end of the battle.
name: Taunting the Knight

description: Whenever a Sarcophagus obstacle is destroyed, it summons a <hyperlink>Skeleton unit</hyperlink> on the defender's side until the end of combat.
name: Haunted Coffins

description: At the start of battle, a couple of War Hound units inflicted with <hyperlink>Berserk</hyperlink> join the fight adjacent to defending units.
name: Escaped Animals

description: All attacking units are immune to <hyperlink>Insanity</hyperlink>.
name: Mentally Stable

description: Every <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, 1 attacking unit is targeted; if it has <hyperlink>Low Morale</hyperlink>, it gains <hyperlink>Insanity</hyperlink>, otherwise it loses 10 <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>Morale</hyperlink>.
name: Dead King's presence

description: Become immune to the <hyperlink>Slowed</hyperlink> effect of the Dead King, but start combat <hyperlink>Distracted</hyperlink>.
name: Slow Immunity

description: All attacking units start combat with +4 <defensefrost></defensefrost> <hyperlink>Frost Resistance</hyperlink>.
name: Frost Resistance

description: This unit is immune to <hyperlink>Insanity</hyperlink>.
name: Insanity Immunity

description: The supporting abilities of attackers give a <hyperlink>Rallying</hyperlink> effect.
name: Rallying support

description: The Dead King inflicts <hyperlink>Slowed</hyperlink> on hits.
name: Lethargy

description: At the start of battle, all attacking units have <hyperlink>Slowed</hyperlink> for 3 <turn></turn>.
name: Slowed Attackers

description: At the start of battle, all defending units have <hyperlink>Slowed</hyperlink> for 3 <turn></turn>.
name: Slowed Defenders

description:
Each 1 , one attacking unit becomes Haunted.

If a Haunted unit stands adjacent to a Sarcophagus obstacle, the Sarcophagus is destroyed and will summon a Skeleton Unit on the defender's side.
name: Stirring Skeletons

description: When this effect expires, any adjacent Sarcophagus obstacle is destroyed and summons a Skeleton <hyperlink>Unit</hyperlink> unit on the defender's side.
name: Haunted

description: Units that are <hyperlink>Wet</hyperlink> will heal 5 <hp></hp> Hit Points at the start of their turn.
name: Soothing Wellspring

description: Adds <combatproperty></combatproperty> to the battle.
At the start of combat, several <hyperlink>Slowing</hyperlink> Spider Web obstacles are present.
name: Sprawling Spiderwebs

description: When a defending <hyperlink>Magma spirit</hyperlink> is killed, it spawns 1 <hyperlink>Lesser magma spirit</hyperlink>.
name: Magma Split

description: Each time the owner's units suffer damage, they gain 1 stack(s) of <hyperlink>Regeneration</hyperlink>.
name: Spring Growth
spell_description: Adds <hyperlink>Combatproperty fey spring</hyperlink> to the battle.

description: Attacking units have -1<statuseffectresistance></statuseffectresistance> <hyperlink>Status Resistance</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
Defending units have -1<statuseffectresistance></statuseffectresistance> <hyperlink>Status Resistance</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
All attacking units' attacks deal +10% damage until the end of battle.
name: Strengthened Attackers

description: All defending units' attacks deal +10% damage until the end of battle.
name: Strengthened Defenders

description: At the start of the owner's turn, enemy units adjacent to owner's units have 90% chance of suffering <hyperlink>Burning</hyperlink> and suffer 5 <damageFire></damageFire> <hyperlink>Fire Damage</hyperlink> for each stack of <hyperlink>Burning</hyperlink> they have.
name: Summer Heat

description: All attacking units have <hyperlink>Sundered defense</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Defenseless Attackers

description: All defending units have <hyperlink>Sundered defense</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Defenseless Defenders

description: All attacking units have <hyperlink>Sundered resistance</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Vulnerable Attackers

description: All defending units have <hyperlink>Sundered resistance</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Vulnerable Defenders

description: Every <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, the attacker's units lose 5 morale.
name: The Wailing

description: Killing the Undead Queen will immediately kill all of her [abilityred]Undead Servants[/abilityred].
name: Undead Queen

description: Every 2 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, all Status Effects on all units are dispelled.
name: Wave of Tranquility

description: All attacking units become <hyperlink>Weakened</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Weakened Attackers

description: All defending units become <hyperlink>Weakened</hyperlink> until the end of battle.
name: Weakened Defenders

description: Enemy units suffer 5 stack(s) of <hyperlink>Demoralized</hyperlink> whenever they kill another unit.
name: Winter Sorrow

description:
All applicable units in the attacking army gain Withering decay property group
Works for Skirmisher, Fighter, Shield, Shock, and Polearm units.
name: Armaments of Decay

description: Your <hyperlink>Expedition leader</hyperlink> gains <hyperlink>Archons smite</hyperlink> for the duration of this combat.
name: Bringer of Judgment

description: Every 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>:[bulletlist]<bullet></bullet>All units become <hyperlink>Wet</hyperlink> for 3 <turn></turn> Turns<bullet></bullet>All <hyperlink>Faithful</hyperlink>, <hyperlink>Zeal</hyperlink>, and <hyperlink>Celestial</hyperlink> units have their negative status effects cleansed.
name: Celestial Rain

description: When a defending <hyperlink>Undead</hyperlink> Unit dies, they resurrect as a <hyperlink>Corrupt soul</hyperlink> after <CORRUPTED_SOULS_UNDYING>TurnsTilRes></CORRUPTED_SOULS_UNDYING>TurnsTilRes> <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Corrupted Souls

description: All units in the attacking army gain <hyperlink>Defensive tactics halo</hyperlink>.
name: Defensive Training

description: Your <hyperlink>Expedition leader</hyperlink> gains <hyperlink>Holy aura enchantment property group</hyperlink> during battle.
name: Embodiment of Light

description: All attacking units gain <hyperlink>Berserkers rage threshold event</hyperlink>.
name: Embrace the Rage

description: Attacking <hyperlink>Support unit</hyperlink> units gain <hyperlink>Free their souls</hyperlink> during battle.
name: Free Their Souls

description: Your <hyperlink>Expedition leader</hyperlink> gains <hyperlink>Steadfast</hyperlink> for <turn></turn> <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink> the first time they fall below <LAST_STAND_THERSHOLD>ResolvedTriggerProportion></LAST_STAND_THERSHOLD>ResolvedTriggerProportion>% <hyperlink><hp></hp></hyperlink>.
name: Last Stand

description: An <hyperlink>Oracle</hyperlink> unit joins you at the start of the battle.
name: Oracles Help

description: At the start of combat, the enemy oracle inflicts <hyperlink>Marked for death</hyperlink> on your leader. This effect lasts until the end of combat, but can be dispelled if the oracle is killed.
name: Prophecy of Death

description: All attacking units gain +4 <defensespirit></defensespirit> <hyperlink>Spirit Resistance</hyperlink>.
name: Radiant Resistance

description: Your <hyperlink>Expedition leader</hyperlink> gains <hyperlink>Martyrs rebirth</hyperlink> during combat.
name: Righteous Martyr

description: Your <hyperlink>Expedition leader</hyperlink> gains <hyperlink>Soulbinders group</hyperlink> on their attacks during battle.
name: Soulbinder

description: All attacking units gain <hyperlink>True strike</hyperlink> at the start of combat.
name: Star Reading

description: All attacking units gain <hyperlink>Precognition</hyperlink> at the start of combat.
name: Supporting Divination

description:
The defenders have forced the Oracles to bring forth prophecies to make their army untouchable.
Each turn of combat a different prophecy will come into effect in order:
effect1_description: Prophecy of Misfortune: All attacking units suffer <hyperlink>Misfortune</hyperlink>
effect2_description: Prophecy of Evasion: All defending units gain <hyperlink>Evasion</hyperlink>
effect3_description: Prophecy of Precognition: All defending units gain <hyperlink>Precognition</hyperlink>
effect4_description: Prophecy of Grace: All defending units gain <hyperlink>Grace</hyperlink>
name: The Untouchables

description: Your <hyperlink>Expedition leader</hyperlink> gains <hyperlink>Undying</hyperlink> during battle.
name: Unbound from Death

description:
Several areas contain Umbral Taint.

Units passing through or ending their turn in Umbral Taint suffer Decaying and -5 Morale unless they have Shadow sickness immunity.
name: Rampant Umbral Taint

description:
The attacking units find themselves speaking in an unknown, ancient tongue.

After the first Turn:
At the start of the attacker's turn, every attacking Unit adjacent to another attacking unit has 30% base chance of suffering Insanity.

If resisted, the unit suffers -5 Morale instead.
name: Umbral Ramblings

description: Each turn in combat, <SUNSTRUCK_ERUPTIONS_COMBAT_PROPERTY>MinCastCount></SUNSTRUCK_ERUPTIONS_COMBAT_PROPERTY>MinCastCount>-<SUNSTRUCK_ERUPTIONS_COMBAT_PROPERTY>MaxCastCount></SUNSTRUCK_ERUPTIONS_COMBAT_PROPERTY>MaxCastCount> markers are placed. Then, after 1 <turn></turn> the ground will erupt and units within 1 <range></range> of the marker will suffer 10 <damagePhysical></damagePhysical> <hyperlink>Physical Damage</hyperlink> and 10 <damageFire></damageFire> <hyperlink>Fire Damage</hyperlink>. Random affected hexes will gain <hyperlink>On Fire</hyperlink>.

My'dhas' units suffer Gilded at the start of combat.
Each 2 a defending unit stops being Gilded.

My'dhas' Melee attacks have 60% chance to inflict Gilded.
Heal unit linked to this unit.
name: Reassemble

description:
While the Krazura Crystal is warding the Progenitor Golem. The Progenitor Golem cannot die and will heal for 20% of its maximum at the end of each Turn.

Destroying the Krazura Crystal will break the ward.
name: Manafuel Ward

description: When this expires, this unit will transform into a greater <hyperlink>Animal</hyperlink> or <hyperlink>Dragon</hyperlink> unit.
name: Marked for Evolution

description: Defending units always attack the closest enemy units, and suffer -40% <hyperlink><accuracy></accuracy> Accuracy</hyperlink> on their <hyperlink>Physical Ranged</hyperlink> attacks.
name: Miscalculating Targeting

description:
Every 2, a defending Animal or Dragon unit gains Marked for evolution.

When it expires, the unit transforms into a greater Animal or Dragon unit until the end of combat.
name: Unnatural Evolution

description: Defending units have a variety of <caststrategic></caststrategic> <hyperlink>Unit Enchantment</hyperlink> and explode on death, dealing 20 <damageFire></damageFire> <hyperlink>Fire Damage</hyperlink> to units within a 2-hex range.
name: Tuned for Destruction

description: Every <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, a few positions become <hyperlink>Poisonous</hyperlink> for 3 turns. All defending units are immune to the poison effect.
name: Acidic Pools

description: All <hyperlink>Dragon</hyperlink> <hyperlink>Unit</hyperlink> gain <hyperlink>Frenzy</hyperlink> until the end of combat.
name: Ancient Draconic Frenzy

description: Every <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, every unit has a 90% of suffering <hyperlink>Remorse</hyperlink>.
name: Behemoth's Dreadful Presence

description: Lesser serpents become <hyperlink>Berserk</hyperlink>.
name: Serpentine Frenzy

description: Several positions in the map contain a Binding Hex. When an Infernal Demon traverses through a Binding Hex, it is <hyperlink>Stunned</hyperlink> for 1 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink> and the Binding Hex is removed.
name: Binding Hex

description: At the start of combat, the Primordial Moth is <hyperlink>Blinded</hyperlink> for 2 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Sensory Overload

description: At the start of combat, your stack leader brings in 3 <GLOBAL.UNITS.DEVASTATOR_SPHERE_UNIT></GLOBAL.UNITS.DEVASTATOR_SPHERE_UNIT>.
name: Bring in Devastators

description: The Primordial Basilisk starts the battle <hyperlink>Stunned</hyperlink> for 1 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Chained Basilisk

description: Every 2 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, the Primordial Moth flaps its wings, causing one of the attacking units to become <hyperlink>Blinded</hyperlink> for 1 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Burning</hyperlink> for 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Cinder Storm

description: The defending clay soldiers gain <hyperlink>Fiery rebirth</hyperlink>.
name: Created by primordial flames

description: Every <value></value> <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, all attacking units have <chance></chance> chance of suffering Volatile Charge.
name: Delayed Volatile Surge

description: At the start of combat, all defending units gain 2 stacks of <hyperlink>Demoralized</hyperlink> until the end of combat.
name: Demoralized Defenders

description: At the start of combat, half of the defending Lithorine units become <hyperlink>Hastened</hyperlink> for 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink> and half of them become <hyperlink>Slowed</hyperlink> for 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Disperse Defenders

description: All <hyperlink>Elemental</hyperlink> <hyperlink>Unit</hyperlink> gain <hyperlink>Elemental attunement unitprop</hyperlink> until the end of combat.
name: Elemental Attunement
property_description:
When a Spell is cast, this unit's base attack gains +1 damage based on the Affinity of the spell: Order Affinity - Spirit Damage Chaos Affinity - Fire Damage Astral Affinity - Lightning Damage Materium Affinity - Physical Damage Nature Affinity - Blight Damage Shadow Affinity - Frost Damage
Stacks up to MaxStacks>MaxStacks> times.

description: Every <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, one of the defending units that hasn't been targeted yet gains the <hyperlink>Supergrowth property group</hyperlink> <caststrategic></caststrategic> <hyperlink>Race Transformation</hyperlink> and heals to full <hyperlink><hp></hp></hyperlink>.
name: Giant's Blessing

description: Every <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, one of the attacking units that hasn't been targeted yet gains the <hyperlink>Supergrowth property group</hyperlink> <caststrategic></caststrategic> <hyperlink>Race Transformation</hyperlink> and heals to full <hyperlink><hp></hp></hyperlink>.
Your Giant Ruler's attacks inflict <hyperlink>Remorse</hyperlink> for 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Giant's Judgment

description: <hyperlink><flank></flank> Flanking</hyperlink> attacks of the attacking units have 90% chance of inflicting <hyperlink>Distracted</hyperlink>.
name: Giant Distraction Tactics

description: The <hyperlink>Expedition leader</hyperlink> gains the <hyperlink>Hunters crossbow skill</hyperlink> property.
name: Giant Slaying Legend

description: Every time Infernal Invaders spawn a unit, your Expedition Leader gains 2 stacks of <hyperlink>Strengthened</hyperlink> for 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Infernal Feed

description: Every 2 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, while the defending Primordial Hound is alive, a defending tier 2 Fiend spawns near it. These units last until the end of combat.
name: Infernal Invaders

description: Half of the defending Lithorine units start the battle <hyperlink>Stunned</hyperlink> for 1 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Lithorite Disruption

description: While the Primordial Bloodback is alive, whenever a defending Lithorine Tier 1 - Tier 3 Unit dies, if there is another Lithorine Corpse on the map, resurrect that one as a Lithorine unit that is 1 tier higher than the Lithorine unit that just died.
name: Stoneshard Recycling

description: All defending units gain <hyperlink>Puny slayer</hyperlink> until the end of combat.
name: Puny Slaying

description: Every <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, one of the defending units that hasn't been targeted yet gains the <hyperlink>Spawnkin property group</hyperlink> <caststrategic></caststrategic> <hyperlink>Race Transformation</hyperlink> and has their Maximum <hyperlink><hp></hp></hyperlink> reduced by 20.
name: Puny Curse

description: Units spawned by Infernal Invaders suffer <hyperlink>Slowed</hyperlink> for 3 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Slowed Invaders

description: All attacking units gain <hyperlink>Stand together</hyperlink> until the end of combat.
name: Together We Stand

description: The defending clay units start combat <hyperlink>Burning</hyperlink>.
name: Stoked Fire

description: All defending clay soldiers are unable to use their <hyperlink>Undying</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Fiery rebirth</hyperlink> ability.
name: Sealed Resurrection

description: Every defending unit is <hyperlink>Taunted</hyperlink> by a random attacking unit until the end of battle.
name: Taunted Sentries

description:
Every Turn, each corpse is resurrected as a random Skeleton unit with Berserk.

Skeleton units themselves are not resurrected by this effect, are Non vital, and die at the end of combat.
name: Undying Battlefield

description: Every 2 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, all attacking units have 60% chance of suffering <hyperlink>Volatile charge</hyperlink>.
name: Volatile Surge

description: Every 2 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>, all attacking units have 60% chance of suffering <hyperlink>Volatile charge</hyperlink> unless they already suffer from it. <hyperlink>Volatile charge</hyperlink> expires in 2 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Volatile Wave
